name: Tango Arjaan by Rotana Istanbul Asia
address: Altaycesme Mah. Samanyolu Sok. No:23, Istanbul
description: Tango Arjaan by Rotana offers 5-star accommodation in Istanbul. There is also a fitness centre with a sauna, a swimming pool and a terrace. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at the hotel, such as free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a ballroom. Couples will enjoy the hotel's features like a concierge floor and massage services. The rooms at Tango Arjaan by Rotana have air conditioning and offer a kitchenette, a mini bar and a coffee maker. All have slippers, a kitchen and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Elements, the in-house eatery, is available for lunch and dinner and serves Turkish and international specialties. Room service is also available during certain times. Tango Arjaan by Rotana is within walking distance of Sureyya Plaji Railway Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. It is also moments from Sea Of Marmara.Revato

name: Loop Hotel Bosphorus Istanbul
address: Pürtelaş Hasan Efendi Mah. Hardal Sokak No:15, Istanbul 34421
description: Attractively located in Istanbul, Loop Hotel Bosphorus İstanbul features air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a terrace and a restaurant. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Rooms are equipped with a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while some rooms have a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Loop Hotel Bosphorus İstanbul the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a halal breakfast. Popular points of interest near Loop Hotel Bosphorus İstanbul include Taksim Square, Taksim Metro Station and Istiklal Street. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 38 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Nex Hotel Istanbul City Center
description: Boasting a bar, Nex Hotel Istanbul City Center is situated in the centre of Istanbul, 700 metres from Istanbul Congress Center. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Popular points of interest near Nex Hotel Istanbul City Center include Taksim Metro Station, Taksim Square and Istiklal Street. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: Star of Istanbul Residence
description: Located 700 metres from Istanbul Congress Center and 2.1 km from Dolmabahce Clock Tower, Star of İstanbul Residence in Istanbul provides air-conditioned accommodation with views of the quiet street and free WiFi. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with slippers, while some rooms feature a terrace or a balcony. A dishwasher, a microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Dolmabahce Palace is 2.5 km from Star of İstanbul Residence, while Taksim Metro Station is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 34 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mia Mia Suites
description: Mia Mia Suites has mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Istanbul, 5.1 km from Istinye Park. Each unit has a terrace offering city views, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge, a microwave and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Istanbul Sapphire is 10 km from the aparthotel, while Turk Telekom Stadium is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 38 km from Mia Mia Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Red Tent Suite 88
description: Providing a garden and free WiFi, The Red Tent Suite 88 provides accommodation well set in Istanbul, within a short distance of Istiklal Street, Taksim Square and Taksim Metro Station. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. There is also a fridge, stovetop and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a halal breakfast. Galata Tower is 1.6 km from The Red Tent Suite 88, while Istanbul Congress Center is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 35 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mas Suites Nisantasi
description: Set in Nisantasi district, 10 minutes' walk from Osmanbey Metro Station, Mas Suites Nişantaşı features a spa centre, sauna and a hammam. Istanbul Congress Center is 1.5 km from the property. Free WiFi is available. You can find many luxury brand shops, restaurants, cafés within walking distance. All units include a satellite flat-screen TV. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. A refrigerator and kettle are also offered. There is a private bathroom with slippers in every unit. You can start the day with a breakfast, enjoyed in the comfort of your room. Packed lunches are also available. There is an on-site coffee shop. Spa facilities include an array of massages and body scrub. Mas Suites Nişantaşı offers 24-hour front desk and concierge service. Besiktas Harbour is 2 km away, enabling easy access to Asian side. Lively shopping district Istiklal Avenue is 2.5 km from Mas Suites Nişantaşı while Istanbul Ataturk Airport is 16 km away.

name: Gökotta Suite
description: Situated in Istanbul, 500 metres from Istiklal Street and 1.9 km from the centre, Gökotta Suite features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and shower. A balcony with city views is offered in each unit. A continental, vegetarian or halal breakfast is available each morning at the property. A car rental service is available at Gökotta Suite. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Istanbul Congress Center, Taksim Square and Taksim Metro Station. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 36 km from Gökotta Suite, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lampa Design Hotel-Special Category
address: Halaskargazi Cad Operator Raif Bey Sok No: 35, Sisli, Istanbul 34363
description: Lampa Design Hotel offers accommodation in Sisli, 2 km from Istanbul Convention & Exhibition Centre. Guests can enjoy open-buffet breakfast served with a selection of natural ingredients from local farms. Featuring solar panels, this eco-friendly hotel is also very conveniently located, just a 5-minute walk from Cevahir Shopping Mall and 900 metres from popular fashion and entertainment district Nisantasi. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Every room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Rooms come with a private bathroom equipped with rain shower and hand shower. The amenities selected carefully from Co.Bigelow to offer total comfort. Free toiletries including slippers are available in the rooms. Breakfast is served at Lampa Lab, where guests can work and chill during the day, with small garden detail. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service are provided upon request at an additional charge. There is also a business centre on site. Acibadem Taksim Hospital is 3 km away, while American Hospital is just 1.3 km from Lampa Design Hotel. Sisli Metro Station is 600 metres away, offering easy access to popular areas such as Taksim Square, historical districts of Sultanahmet and also Istanbul Ataturk Airport. The nearest airport is Ataturk Airport, 21 km from Lampa Design Hotel.

name: Otantik Guest House
description: No description found

name: The Magnaura Palace Hotel
address: Sultanahmet Mah. Dalbasti Sok. No:13/1 Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34400
description: Located in the heart of Sultanahmet area, this hotel is just 150 metres from Blue Mosque and 250 metres from Hagia Sophia. The hotel offers luxurious rooms and a terrace with views of these historical mosques. The air-conditioned rooms of The Magnaura Palace Hotel are decorated with Turkish textiles. Each room is equipped with an LCD TV, seating area, a minibar and an electric kettle. Some rooms also offer views of the Marmara Sea and the ruins of Magnaura Palace. The hotel serves buffet breakfast in the morning. There are also many eateries in the area where you can dine. The staff at the Magnaua Palace Hotel can help plan visits and excursions, book a tour or rent a car. They can also provide an airport shuttle service upon request, from either Ataturk or Sabiha Gokcen airports. Topkapi Palace and Basilica Cistern are 450 metres from Hotel Magnaura Palace. Sultanahmet Tram Stop is 650 metres away offering easy access to various ferry ports and the metro line. Ataturk Airport is within 20 km. The hotel can arrange private airport transfer at an additional fee. Istanbul Airport is within 52 km.

name: Opera Suites Okanli
address: Catma Mescit Çesme sk. Okanli Pera No12, Istanbul 34430
description: Situated less than 1 km from Galata Tower and a 16-minute walk from Istiklal Street, O'Pera Okanlı Suites in Istanbul features air-conditioned accommodation with views of the quiet street and free WiFi. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. Some units have a terrace and/or a balcony with sea or river views. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. O'Pera Okanlı Suites provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Taksim Square is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Taksim Metro Station is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 35 km from O'Pera Okanlı Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Baymari Suites Plus Florya
description: Set in Istanbul in the Marmara Region region and Florya Beach reachable within 1.9 km, BayMari Suites Plus Florya offers accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower in every unit, along with slippers, a hair dryer and free toiletries. The apartment offers an outdoor fireplace. BayMari Suites Plus Florya has a garden and sun terrace, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits. Menekse Beach is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Suleymaniye Mosque is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 40 km from BayMari Suites Plus Florya, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pera Wall Hotel & Suites
description: PERA WALL HOTEL&SUİTES features air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Istanbul, 500 metres from Istiklal Street, 1.5 km from Istanbul Congress Center and 500 metres from Taksim Square. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a dining table, a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge and microwave are also featured, as well as a kettle. A car rental service is available at the aparthotel. Taksim Metro Station is 700 metres from PERA WALL HOTEL&SUİTES, while Galata Tower is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rexee Hotel
description: In a prime location in Istanbul, REXEE HOTEL provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. The property is located 2.5 km from Dolmabahce Clock Tower, 2.6 km from Istanbul Congress Center and 1.3 km from Galata Tower. The accommodation offers a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At REXEE HOTEL all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, halal or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Taksim Square, Taksim Metro Station and Istiklal Street. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 37 km from REXEE HOTEL.

name: Sultanahmet Isil Hotel
address: Şehsuvar bey mahallesi ışıl çıkmazı no 2 Fatih İstanbul, Istanbul 34126
description: Situated in Istanbul, 1.2 km from Blue Mosque, SULTANAHMET ıŞIL HOTEL features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a children's playground. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with slippers and an iPod docking station. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. SULTANAHMET ıŞIL HOTEL offers a barbecue. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near SULTANAHMET ıŞIL HOTEL include Basilica Cistern, Hagia Sophia and Column of Constantine. The nearest airport is Istanbul Sabiha Gokcen International Airport, 38 km from the hotel.

name: La Porte de Taksim
address: Kocatepe Mahallesi Feridiye Caddesi no38, Istanbul 34400
description: Attractively located in the centre of Istanbul, La Porte de Taksim is within 400 metres of Istiklal Street and 1.5 km of Istanbul Congress Center. The property is situated 2.2 km from Galata Tower, 3.1 km from Dolmabahce Palace and 4 km from Spice Bazaar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At La Porte de Taksim rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Taksim Square, Taksim Metro Station and Dolmabahce Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Istanbul Airport, 36 km from La Porte de Taksim.

name: Mövenpick Living Istanbul Camlivadi
address: Hamidiye Mahallesi Ihlas Sokak C Blok No:13 Kagithane, Istanbul 34408
description: Cosy and comfortable accomodation experience at spacious apartments right in the financial and business district of Istanbul with forest view. Hotel is located just a few minutes away from the most elegant quarter of the town Vadistanbul and Vadistanbul Mall. All apartments are furnished and equipped as a home with state of teh art technology and contemporary design.accorhotels.com

name: Istanberry - Luna Apartments
description: Located in the centre of Istanbul, 700 metres from Istiklal Street and less than 1 km from Taksim Square, Istanberry - Luna Apartments provides accommodation with free WiFi. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. A stovetop and kettle are also provided. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, American or halal options. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Taksim Metro Station, Galata Tower and Istanbul Congress Center. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 35 km from Istanberry - Luna Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Element Residence
description: Situated in the centre of Istanbul, Element Residence has well-equipped accommodation boasting free WiFi, 600 metres from Istiklal Street and 800 metres from Taksim Square. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. The aparthotel provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Element Residence include Taksim Metro Station, Istanbul Congress Center and Dolmabahce Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Istanbul, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
